<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"刷新 Bearer Token"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/token/refresh"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



使用有效的刷新令牌获取新的访问令牌。

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"refreshToken":{"type":"string"}},"required":["refreshToken"],"title":"TokenRefreshRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"成功","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"accessToken":{"type":"string","example":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzM4NCJ9..."},"refreshToken":{"type":"string"},"expiresIn":{"type":"integer","description":"访问令牌有效期（秒）","example":7200}},"required":["accessToken","expiresIn"],"title":"AuthToken"}}}},"400":{"description":"无效的请求"},"401":{"description":"未授权"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
